==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|はな|さま|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|鼻|tr1=hana|t1=nose|pos2=honorific|様|tr2=sama|lang=ja}}. From the practice of pointing to one's nose to refer to oneself.

===Pronoun===
{{ja-pos|はなさま|pronoun}}

# an arrogant, proud first person personal pronoun; [[I]], [[me]], [[myself]].

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|俺様}}, {{l|ja|己様}}
